allowPlayersDrag.EnableHint: Check to allow Players drag Rewards from Quest's Details window to their Owned Actors.

availableQuests.EnableHint: Check to show new, "Available" tab in Quest Log, where players can see all non-hidden Quests before they are accepted.

countHidden.EnableHint: If checked, the number of completed/total tasks will include hidden tasks.

navStyle.EnableHint: Decide how Quest Log's navigation should be displayed.

showFolder.EnableHint: Check to show quest data Folder in Journal tab. For DEBUG purposes only.

showTasks.EnableHint: Decide if or how to show amount of Tasks (objectives) next to Quest's title in Quest Log. This has no effect on Quest individual preview.

titleAlign.EnableHint: Decide how to position quests' titles in Quest Log's table.

playersWelcomeScreen.EnableHint: Uncheck to prevent players from seeing Welcome Screen on log in after an update. They might still see it by clicking 'help' icon in Quest Log.

allowPlayersAccept.EnableHint: Check to allow players to accept Quests from Available tab.

allowPlayersCreate.EnableHint: Check to allow players to create Quests. Player created Quests will land in Available tab with Player Edit permissions. REQUIRES 'create journal' core permission.
